Ive heard recently and I don't know where that a group of Democrats and Liberals burnt the U.S. flag. has anyone else heard news about this? If you have please comment

Some people burn the flag and it turns into a bunch of liberals and Democrats? Unless you're talking about politicians you have no point here. Hell I've already said if both houses of Congress pass the anti-flag burning amendment the first thing I'm doing is burning every American flag I own.  I didnt mean to bash the Democrats. I had heard RECENTLY that some ( yes maybe Democratic "politicians") had burnt the flag and I wanted to know their reasoning.. And as the you burning the flag yes it is free speech but where did the morals go? people take free speech to the extremes. weve lost all sense of propriety and order. especially in the U.S. And everything will not be gone. If we stand against these people then its not gone.
